titles.title: A resolution commending the University of Nebraska-Lincoln women's volleyball team for winning the National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Women's Volleyball Championship.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/29/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Commends the University of Nebraska-Lincoln volleyball team for winning the 2006 National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I Women's Volleyball National Championship.
